Description: The cubesat shall deorbit within 25 years of the end of its mission
The cubesat shall support a downlink capacity of at least 5 GB per day to the ground segment
The cubesat shall provide enough power to permanently power all subsystems
The cubesat shall capture images of the Earth at a resolution of 40m per pixel
The cubesat shall maintain a pointing accuracy of ±2 degrees for the payload during data collection
